name: Don't Let Them Lay Eggs in Your Brain!
name_original: Don't Let Them Lay Eggs in Your Brain!
description:
Use your mouse to move.
Left click to shoot.
Grab hair spray to reroll your hair!
      

Don't let them lay eggs in your brain. Use your incredibly wild hair to defend your precious cranium. Can YOU survive this bizzare shmup and defeat the boss?

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022, with the theme "Roll of the dice".

With skin-crawling art by Lumpy [Twitter] [YouTube],
three original music tracks by Rukunetsu [Twitter] [YouTube],
and introducing Fredison [Twitter] as the friendly neighbourhood coder.
